# SPIDERMAN

> Minimal distributed web crawler for JavaScript

## Installation

### Requirements

- Node.js >= 8.0.0

### Instructions

- With npm: `npm i @albert-team/spiderman@canary`
- With yarn: `yarn add @albert-team/spiderman@canary`

## Usage

## Documentation

Read more [here](https://albert-team.github.io/spiderman).
